<title level="1" right="Trait">[Infamous](/Traits.aspx?ID=448)</title>

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 543

The Infamous trait increases your Infamy score when the structure is built. Some structures have both [Famous](/Traits.aspx?ID=447) and Infamous traits; in this case apply the one that matches your kingdom's preference (see [Fame and Infamy](/Rules.aspx?ID=1792)).
